Departement.Name: Product
Departement.ManagerDescription:
∙ Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and prioritize product features and requirements.
∙ Create and maintain a product roadmap and release plan.
∙ Coordinate with development teams to ensure tasks are completed according to schedule and budget.
∙ Conduct user research and gather feedback to improve product performance and usability.
∙ Work with the marketing team to develop go-to-market strategies and product messaging.
∙ Monitor product performance and respond to customer feedback and issues.
∙ Analyze market trends and competitors to identify opportunities for product enhancement.
∙ Manage product backlog and prioritize user stories for development teams.
∙ Facilitate sprint planning, review,
Departement.CollaboratorDescription:
∙ Define and prioritize the product backlog in collaboration with the development team.
∙ Gather requirements from stakeholders and translate them into user stories.
∙ Work with the development team to ensure that user stories are implemented correctly and meet stakeholder needs.
∙ Conduct user acceptance testing to ensure that the product meets quality standards.
∙ Communicate with stakeholders to gather feedback and provide updates on the progress of the project.
∙ Make decisions on product features and prioritize them based on business value and stakeholder needs.
∙ Collaborate with the Scrum Master and other team members to ensure that the product is delivered on time and within budget.
∙ Monitor and evaluate the performance of the product and make adjustments as needed.
∙ Keep up-to-date with market trends and competitor products to inform product decisions.
∙ Continuously improve the product development process and identify opportunities for innovation.

Departement.Name: Sales
Departement.ManagerDescription:
∙ Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve company targets and objectives
∙ Lead and motivate the sales team to meet and exceed sales goals
∙ Monitor and analyze sales data to track performance and identify areas for improvement
∙ Train and onboard new sales team members to ensure they have the knowledge and skills to succeed
∙ Build and maintain relationships with key clients and business partners
∙ Collaborate with marketing and product development teams to align sales strategies with overall business objectives
∙ Conduct regular performance reviews and provide feedback to sales team members
∙ Attend industry events and conferences to network and stay up-to-date on industry trends
∙ Develop and maintain sales forecasts and budgets
∙ Provide regular reports to senior management on sales performance and initiatives.
Departement.CollaboratorDescription:
∙ Prospecting and generating leads
∙ Qualifying leads based on specific criteria
∙ Conducting product demonstrations and presentations
∙ Negotiating and closing sales deals
∙ Building and maintaining long-term relationships with clients
∙ Providing excellent customer service and support
∙ Following up with clients to ensure satisfaction and repeat business
∙ Monitoring and analyzing sales performance and metrics
∙ Collaborating with marketing and product teams to develop sales strategies
∙ Staying updated on industry trends and competitor activities.

Departement.Name: QA
Departement.ManagerDescription:
∙ Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve company targets and objectives
∙ Lead and motivate the sales team to meet and exceed sales goals
∙ Monitor and analyze sales data to track performance and identify areas for improvement
∙ Train and onboard new sales team members to ensure they have the knowledge and skills to succeed
∙ Build and maintain relationships with key clients and business partners
∙ Collaborate with marketing and product development teams to align sales strategies with overall business objectives
∙ Conduct regular performance reviews and provide feedback to sales team members
∙ Attend industry events and conferences to network and stay up-to-date on industry trends
∙ Develop and maintain sales forecasts and budgets
∙ Provide regular reports to senior management on sales performance and initiatives.
Departement.CollaboratorDescription:
∙ Review and analyze requirements and specifications.
∙ Develop and execute test plans and test cases.
∙ Perform manual testing of software applications.
∙ Identify and report bugs and issues in a detailed manner.
∙ Verify bug fixes and ensure they meet the specified requirements.
∙ Conduct regression testing to ensure that previously fixed bugs do not reappear.
∙ Collaborate with developers and other team members to resolve issues.
∙ Provide feedback on the overall quality of the software.
∙ Participate in sprint planning and retrospective meetings.
∙ Stay updated on industry best practices and tools related to testing.

Departement.Name: Dev
Departement.ManagerDescription:
∙ Lead and manage the team of developers, ensuring they have the necessary resources and support to complete projects successfully
∙ Set and communicate clear goals and expectations for the team, and track progress towards those goals
∙ Hire, train, and mentor developers, providing ongoing feedback and guidance to help them grow and improve
∙ Collaborate with other teams and stakeholders to define project requirements and ensure alignment with business and technical objectives
∙ Develop project timelines, budgets, and resource plans, and manage projects to ensure they are completed on time and within budget
∙ Identify and address technical challenges and roadblocks, working with the team to find creative solutions
∙ Stay current on industry trends and best practices, and make recommendations for new technologies or tools that could improve the team's efficiency and effectiveness
∙ Ensure compliance with coding standards, security protocols, and other best practices to maintain a high level of quality in the team's work.
Departement.CollaboratorDescription:
∙ Writing and reviewing code
∙ Debugging and troubleshooting technical issues
∙ Developing and implementing software solutions
∙ Collaborating with other team members on projects
∙ Testing and quality assurance of code
∙ Researching new technologies and tools
∙ Participating in code reviews and providing feedback
∙ Documenting code and technical processes
∙ Providing technical support to clients or end-users
∙ Following best practices and coding standards.

Departement.Name: HR
Departement.ManagerDescription:
• Assess the staffing needs for annual maintenance tasks.
• Collaborate with department heads to understand maintenance requirements and align staffing strategies accordingly.
• Oversee the recruitment process for maintenance personnel, ensuring that the right skills and expertise are available.
• Plan and facilitate training programs to ensure that employees are knowledgeable about maintenance procedures, safety protocols, and compliance standards.
• Implement ongoing development programs to keep staff updated on the latest maintenance technologies and practices.
• Manage administrative tasks related to staffing, such as maintaining records of attendance and time-off requests.
• Work with management to create and manage the budget for personnel-related expenses in maintenance activities.
Departement.CollaboratorDescription:
• Assess the staffing needs for annual maintenance tasks.
• Collaborate with department heads to understand maintenance requirements and align staffing strategies accordingly.
• Oversee the recruitment process for maintenance personnel, ensuring that the right skills and expertise are available.
• Plan and facilitate training programs to ensure that employees are knowledgeable about maintenance procedures, safety protocols, and compliance standards.
• Implement ongoing development programs to keep staff updated on the latest maintenance technologies and practices.
• Manage administrative tasks related to staffing, such as maintaining records of attendance and time-off requests.
• Work with management to create and manage the budget for personnel-related expenses in maintenance activities.
